## Recommendation Engine V2

**Phase:** Phase 6 - Enterprise & Advanced Features
**Timeline:** 10-12 weeks
**Section:** 6.4

### Goal
Enterprise-ready with advanced features

### Impact
Dramatically improves recommendations

### Effort Estimate
4 weeks
